participant_1.background:
I'm not a morning person, but I'll do it for my best friend.
I'm not sure if I'm good at keeping up with my family, but I love them and I try to make time for them whenever I can.
I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college.
under a pen name , i write romance books.

content.text: Hi, I am participant_1, I am an author.
Hi participant_2, I am participant_2, I love to read.
Nice to meet you! Do you have a favorite book?
I have a lot of favorite books but my favorite author is [author name].
Oh, I have read a few books by [author name]. I really like them.
Yeah, their books are really good. I love the way they write.
Me too. I am also an author.
Really? That's awesome! What kind of books do you write?
Oh, that's cool. I love romance books.
Thanks. I am glad to hear that.
So, what is your ideal lunch date?
My ideal lunch date would be with someone who loves to read, like me.
That's a great idea. I would love to have a lunch date with you.
That would be great. I would love to meet you.
Awesome. I will send you a message.
